mapper.select: select gd_id,gd_name,brand_id,cat_id,cat_parentid,gd_time,cat_sonid,ad_ex_id,gd_number,gd_price,gd_mprice,gd_addtime,gd_display,gd_img,gd_priceclass,gd_order,gd_describe,gd_area,gd_prca,gd_deimg,gd_colour,gd_place,gd_uptime from wt_goods where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wt_goods
gd_name = #{gdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cat_parentid = #{catParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_time = #{gdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cat_sonid = #{catSonid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ad_ex_id = #{adExId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_number = #{gdNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_price = #{gdPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gd_mprice = #{gdMprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gd_addtime = #{gdAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gd_display = #{gdDisplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_img = #{gdImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_priceclass = #{gdPriceclass,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_order = #{gdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_describe = #{gdDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_area = #{gdArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_prca = #{gdPrca,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_deimg = #{gdDeimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_colour = #{gdColour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_place = #{gdPlace,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_uptime = #{gdUptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wt_goods set gd_name = #{gdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cat_parentid = #{catParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_time = #{gdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cat_sonid = #{catSonid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_ex_id = #{adExId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_number = #{gdNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_price = #{gdPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gd_mprice = #{gdMprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gd_addtime = #{gdAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gd_display = #{gdDisplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_img = #{gdImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_priceclass = #{gdPriceclass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_order = #{gdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_describe = #{gdDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_area = #{gdArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_prca = #{gdPrca,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_deimg = #{gdDeimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_colour = #{gdColour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_place = #{gdPlace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_uptime = #{gdUptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where gd_id = #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select gd_id , gd_img , gd_price , gd_name from wt_goods where cat_parentid = #{catParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 order by gd_id desc limit 8
select gd_id , gd_img , gd_price , gd_name from wt_goods where cat_sonid = #{catSonid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 order by gd_id desc limit 12
select gd_id , gd_img , gd_price , gd_name from wt_goods where cat_parentid = #{catParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 order by gd_id desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 12
select gd_id , gd_img , gd_price , gd_name from wt_goods where cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 order by gd_id desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 12
select * from wt_goods where cat_sonid = #{catSonid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 order by gd_id desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 12
select * from wt_goods where gd_display = 1 order by gd_id desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 12

select gd_id,gd_name,brand_id,cat_id,cat_parentid,gd_time,cat_sonid,ad_ex_id,gd_number,gd_price,gd_mprice,gd_addtime,gd_display,gd_img,gd_priceclass,gd_order,gd_describe,gd_area,gd_prca,gd_deimg,gd_colour,gd_place,gd_uptime from wt_goods where gd_display = 1 and gd_name like concat(concat('%',#{gdName}),'%') order by gd_id desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 12
select count(*) from wt_goods where cat_sonid = #{catSonid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1
select count(*) from wt_goods where cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1
select count(*) from wt_goods where cat_parentid = #{catParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1
select count(*) from wt_goods where gd_display = 1
select * from wt_goods where gd_id != #{gdId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ad_ex_id =#{adExId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 order by gd_id desc limit 4
select count(*) from wt_goods where ad_ex_id = #{adExId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1
select * from wt_goods where ad_ex_id = #{adExId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 order by gd_addtime desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 12

select gd_id,gd_name,brand_id,cat_id,cat_parentid,gd_time,cat_sonid,ad_ex_id,gd_number,gd_price,gd_mprice,gd_addtime,gd_display,gd_img,gd_priceclass,gd_order,gd_describe,gd_area,gd_prca,gd_deimg,gd_colour,gd_place,gd_uptime from wt_goods where ad_ex_id = #{adExId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 and gd_name like concat(concat('%',#{gdName}),'%') order by gd_id desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 12
select count(*) from wt_goods where ad_ex_id = #{adExId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and gd_display = 1 and gd_name like concat(concat('%',#{gdName}),'%')
